ASIC_SENSORS_TABLE.desc: Config DB interval parameters for ASIC Sensors polling

ASIC_SENSORS_INVALID_POLLER_INTERVAL.desc: Configure an invalid ASIC Sensors polling interval

ASIC_SENSORS_INVALID_POLLER_ADMIN_STATUS.desc: Configure an invalid ASIC Sensors polling admin status

ASIC_SENSORS_POLLER_INTERVAL_BAD_LEN_MAX.desc: Configure an invalid ASIC Sensors polling interval: out of range value

ASIC_SENSORS_POLLER_INTERVAL_EMPTY_VALUE.desc: Configure an empty ASIC Sensors polling interval

ASIC_SENSORS_POLLER_ADMIN_STATUS_EMPTY_V.desc: Configure an empty ASIC Sensors polling admin status
